innhold.avsnitt: You can take the co-mother quota from week seven after the birth or wait until the child is a bit bigger. You can take the weeks together, divide these up or combine them with partial work.
The co-mother quota must be taken before the joint period is over or you must apply for utsettelse.
If you adopt, you can take the co-mother quota at any time after care of the child is assumed.
If you become so sick that you are completely dependent on assistance for taking care of the child, the mother can apply to take over your co-mother quota.

A co-mother is someone who has been granted legal parental responsibility for the child. If you have not been granted co-maternity, you may be entitled to the parental benefit if you adopt the child as a stepchild and there are still days remaining in the parental benefit period.
